failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: instance type (array) does not match any allowed primitive type (allowed: ["object"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/D:/BelajarSelenium/Bootcamp%20Selenium%20After%20Office/seleniumproject/target/test-classes/schema_addObject.json#","pointer":""} instance: {"pointer":""} domain: "validation" keyword: "type" found: "array" expected: ["object"]

testcase.name: runScenario["Register a new user", "Employee API"](2)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Register a new user # src/test/resources/features/addUser.feature:6 Given The base url in this feature is "https://whitesmokehouse.com/webhook" # cucumber.definitions.addUser.setBaseUrl(java.lang.String) When Send a http "POST" request to "/api/register" with body: # cucumber.definitions.addUser.sendRequestWithBody(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) """ { "email": "dirwan543@gmail.com", "full_name": "dirwan tea", "password": "Bintaro1!", "department": "Technology", "phone_number": "085590932219" } """ Then The response status must be 200 # cucumber.definitions.addUser.validateResponseStatus(int) And The response schema should be match with schema "schema_register.json" # cucumber.definitions.addUser.validateJsonSchema(java.lang.String)
